NAME: recordIndex
LONG_DESC: Unique index (per haplotype) for each alignment record

NAME: qryPos
LONG_DESC: Query start position in original contig (not reverse complemented if alignment was)

NAME: qryEnd
LONG_DESC: Query end position in original contig (not reverse complemented if alignment was)

NAME: qryOrd
LONG_DESC: Order of the aligned query segment from the start of the query sequence to the end

NAME: mapQual
LONG_DESC: Maping quality. May be a list of alignment was aggregated.

NAME: alignFlags
LONG_DESC: Alignment flags. May be a list if alignment was aggregated.

NAME: score
LONG_DESC: Alignment score using PAVs scoring system.

NAME: scoreProp
LONG_DESC: Proportion of the alignment score over the maximum score.

NAME: matchProp
LONG_DESC: Proportion of aligned bases that are matches.

NAME: qryProp
LONG_DESC: Proportion of the query sequence aligned in this record

NAME: qryProp
LONG_DESC: Proportion of the assembled query sequence represented by this alignment.

NAME: trimRefL
LONG_DESC: Number of reference bases trimmed from the left side

NAME: trimRefR
LONG_DESC: Number of reference bases trimmed from the right side

NAME: trimTigL
LONG_DESC: Number of contig (query) bases trimmed from the left side

NAME: trimTigR
LONG_DESC: Number of contig (query) bases trimmed from the right side
